dmca.title: FamilyResource complains of copied text
dmca.body:
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on:
http://www.familyresource.com/parenting/divorce-and-separation/checklist-of-protective-and-risk-factors-for-children-of-divorce

I conducted a search on "Risk Factors for Children of Divorce" http://www.google.com/search?q=Risk+Factors+for+Children+of+Divorce

Infringing Web Page:
http://library.adoption.com/parenting-and-families/checklist-of-protective-and-risk-factors-for-children-of-divorce/article/2494/1.html

Copyright Owner Information: [private]@familyresource.com
[private]
Nashville, TN 37205
[private]

Infringing Owner Information: [private]@adoption.com
[private]
Gilbert, AZ 85234
[private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Sincerely,
 
 
[private] Owner & Editor FamilyResource.com
